Location.LocationBody: Web Project Mechanics is a Web Content Management System built using the ASP.Net framework.  WPM is written in Visual Basic and uses XML and MS-Access for data storage.  It is currently being developed for release on CodePlex.

Location.LocationDescription: The famous Sleeping Giant is near Zakopane, in south Poland. The legend sais that the sleeping giant gets up and protects the town from the big storms and the strangers attacks. In fact it is a big mountain ridge coverd with snow and has a shape of a sleeping giant.

Location.LocationDescription: Web Project Mechanics Examples DHTML Hover Techniques
Location.LocationKeywords: Web Project Mechanics Examples DHTML Hover Techniques
Location.LocationBody:
This example shows how to utilize css hovering Hover the cursor over the day links to see additional content appear View source to see the HTML and CSS being used

CSS Used in this Example

   div.exDiv   {width:90px;}
  a.exLink     {position:relative; color:orange; font-weight:bold;}
  a.exLink span {position:absolute; display:none; text-decoration:none;
                color:black; background-color:yellow; border:5px solid green;
                padding:5px; margin:3px;z-index:5;top:20px; left:15px; width:200px;height:75px;}
  a.exLink:hover span {display:block;}

HTML Used in this Example

  <div class="exDiv">
    <a class="exLink" href="#">John F Kennedy
      <span>Ask Not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do 
            for your country
      </span>
    </a>
  </div>

Hover over JFK link to see it working

John F KennedyAsk Not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country

You can download the latest code from GitHub

<script src="/sites/MechanicsOfMotherhood/lib/headerRotator.js" type="text/javascript"></script> <script type="text/javascript">

window.addEvent('load', function(){
  var headers = [];
  headers.push('/sites/MechanicsOfMotherhood/images/header03.jpg');
  headers.push('/sites/MechanicsOfMotherhood/images/header03.jpg');
  headers.push('/sites/MechanicsOfMotherhood/images/header03.jpg');

  var rok = new headerRotator('header', headers, {
    'duration': 1000,
    'delay': 3000,
    'start': 0,
    'autoplay': 0
    });
});

</script>
